attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Insist that all horses that are ridden on public roads should be tested and certificated as "Thunder proof", for the saftey of all road users and riders. No mounted police officer would ride a horse that is not. why should a horse be allowed on the the road when it is not steady under road noise and movement?

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
